VASSAL.tools.io

Class IOUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.commons.io.IOUtils
      • VASSAL.tools.io.IOUtils

  • public class IOUtils
extends org.apache.commons.io.IOUtils
    General I/O stream manipulation utilities. This class provides static utility methods to reduce boilerplate I/O code.
    Since:
    3.1.0

    • Method Detail

      • copy

        public static int copy(java.io.FileInputStream in,
                       java.io.FileOutputStream out)
                throws java.io.IOException
        Copies bytes from a FileInputStream to a FileOutputStream. This method uses channels. The input file should not be written to during the copy.
        Parameters:
        in - the source
        out - the destination
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if one occurs while reading or writing

      • copyLarge

        public static long copyLarge(java.io.FileInputStream in,
                             java.io.FileOutputStream out)
                      throws java.io.IOException
        Copies bytes from a large (over 2GB) FileInputStream to a FileOutputStream. This method uses channels. The input file should not be written to during the copy.
        Parameters:
        in - the source
        out - the destination
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if one occurs while reading or writing

      • copy

        public static int copy(java.io.InputStream in,
                       java.io.OutputStream out,
                       byte[] buffer)
                throws java.io.IOException
        Copies bytes from an InputStream to an OutputStream via a byte buffer. This method buffers input internally, so the input stream should not be a BufferedInputStream.
        Parameters:
        in - the source
        out - the destination
        buffer - the buffer
        Returns:
        the number of bytes copied
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if one occurs while reading or writing

      • copyLarge

        public static long copyLarge(java.io.InputStream in,
                             java.io.OutputStream out,
                             byte[] buffer)
                      throws java.io.IOException
        Copies bytes from a large (over 2GB) InputStream to an OutputStream via a byte buffer. This method buffers input internally, so the input stream should not be a BufferedInputStream.
        Parameters:
        in - the source
        out - the destination
        buffer - the buffer
        Returns:
        the number of bytes copied
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if one occurs while reading or writing

      • closeQuietly

        public static void closeQuietly(java.io.ObjectInput o)
        Close an ObjectInput unconditionally. Equivalent to calling o.close() when o is nonnull. IOExceptions are swallowed, as there is generally nothing that can be done about exceptions on closing.
        Parameters:
        o - a (possibly null) ObjectInput

      • closeQuietly

        public static void closeQuietly(java.io.ObjectOutput o)
        Close an ObjectOutput unconditionally. Equivalent to calling o.close() when o is nonnull. IOExceptions are swallowed, as there is generally nothing that can be done about exceptions on closing.
        Parameters:
        o - a (possibly null) ObjectOutput

      • closeQuietly

        public static void closeQuietly(java.util.zip.ZipFile z)
        Close a ZipFile unconditionally. Equivalent to calling z.close() when z is nonnull. IOExceptions are swallowed, as there is generally nothing that can be done about exceptions on closing.
        Parameters:
        z - a (possibly null) ZipFile

      • closeQuietly

        public static void closeQuietly(javax.imageio.stream.ImageInputStream s)
        Close an ImageInputStream unconditionally. Equivalent to calling s.close() when s is nonnull. IOExceptions are quietly logged, as there is generally nothing that can be done about exceptions on closing.
        Parameters:
        s - a (possibly null) ImageInputStream
